question: Which Indian state has inaugurated its largest Greenfield oxygen plant commissioned by INOX Air Products?
explanation:
The Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath has virtually inaugurated the stateâ€™s largest oxygen plant in Modinagar, Ghaziabad.
The plant is commissioned by the leading manufacturers of industrial and medical gases, INOX Air Products (INOX). The project outlay of the plant is Rs 135 crore and it has a capacity of 150 tonnes liquid medical oxygen per day.
